In deciding who should take the business forward, we wanted someone with the right mix of leadership, vision and hard-core engineering chops, chief executive Steve Ballmer wrote in an email to company employees that Microsoft published." They made veteran plays. The Memphis Grizzlies were hurt by their youth. Allen Iverson had 32 points and 12 assists Wednesday night, and the Nuggets used a late run to beat the Grizzlies 106-102." This was a Yao Ming win for us at somebody else's home, Allen Iverson said." Down seven points with 3 minutes to go. It was a gut check for us. This is the second job that Andy Coulson has resigned from for something he claims to know nothing about," Watson said. His departure creates serious questions over the prime minister's judgment and points to the need for a deeper investigation into the affairs of Rupert Murdoch 's News Corp." It's a mark of the man that he would sneak out a statement on a Friday morning on a busy news day. Spin and obfuscation is all we get from Downing Street- we need to get to the truth.
